name: Duckmares
description:
Duckmares!

You control a little duck name Jeff who is stuck in his worst nightmare!

One day Jeff wakes up, finds himself in a strange place and starts to uncover the reason behind this abnormal nightmare.

Duckmares is a 2d top-down action/adventure game with a fluid duck controls, bunch of zombies, "mind-blowing" puzzles and an old-looking-aristocrat-professor-duck named Dr. Docturne!

Credits:

Ahmet Tarık Durmaz - Level Design & Art

Mehmet Alp Tamer - Narrative & Environment Design

Yiğit Ömer Kayhan - Artist & Animator

Yiğit Doruk - Game Designer & Developer
